text.data: Chapter 21 The Holy Dragon Bahamut[end]
Hornet: That we would be letting Sauzer aboard...[end]
Hornet: We can't see into tomorrow... Can we?[end]
[character][0x1]: Oh, Palpaleos... The door will open... The Holy Dragons will open the door...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! The door!? Where will it open?[end]
[character][0x1]: ...Palpaleos.[end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x1]! Are you okay!?[end]
Chapter 22 The Final Battle[end]

Matelite: Seems the door in the sky to the new era has opened..
[character][0x1], take care of the rest. I'm...[end]
[character][0x1]: I have something to say.[end]
Rush: I don't wanna hear... I dunno what she's gonna say, but when I fight I wanna do it without having to think.[end]
Truce: What're you saying, Rush? Don't you wanna see those two together?[end]
Rush: Shut up![end]
Matelite: What the?! What was that?![end]
Hornet: It seems we're under attack... But from above or below?[end]
Taicho: It was from below! It is the Granbelos Empire![end]
Palpaleos: It's Gudolf.[end]
Matelite: Granbelos! What're you doing at a time like this?![end]
Matelite: Hmph! [character][0x1], finish getting ready![end]
Chapter 24 To the Homeland...[end]
Hornet: Sorry, [character][0x1]! I can't control it! We're being sucked in![end]
Hornet: There's something that looks like a lagoon...[end]

Matelite: A moment of silence. For Sauzer? No, not for him.
An era has just ended! A moment of silence for the old Orelus![end]

Matelite: [character][0x1]. I'm not relieved one bit.
Same goes for Palpaleos, but why'd we bring Sauzer on board?
I don't understand [character][0x1]'s thinking at all, lately...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]. Those are the eyes of a man prepared to die...[end]
Matelite: Is [character][0x1] okay?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! Wake up![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]. Continue with our preparations. Calmly and dignified...[end]

Matelite: [character][0x1]'s very close to Palpaleos. She won't even bother with me... When she was little, she'd follow me around and call me Uncle Matty.
[character][0x1]. Do you know the first word she learned?
It was [0x24]Matty[0x22]. Not [0x24]Daddy[0x22] or [0x24]Mommy[0x22]... [0x24]Matty[0x22]. Me!
She probably meant [0x24]fatty[0x22]. Things sure were nice back then...[end1]
Oh...[end]
What do you think of my memory?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1] has grown strong. I'm glad, but now I'm lonely.[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1] is always in the attendance of that weeping man. Her important stories are also hearsay...[end]
Zora: Come on. The two love each other... let them be.[end]
Taicho: Captain of the Orelus Dragon Squad. Acting Captain of [character][0x1]. Continue your hard work![end]
Taicho: Emperor Sauzer is here... Yet I feel no strangeness or hatred...[end]

Taicho: The beautiful lagoons of Orelus, engulfed in the flames of destruction...
Our battles are one and the same...[end]
Taicho: She suddenly fainted![end]
Taicho: It would be best to stay away from Matelite. He is irritated about [character][0x1] and Palpaleos.[end]
Celine... I have come this far... But even here, battles await me...[end]
Sendak: I am... a shivering old man. Does that make me... a cowardly old man?[end]

Sendak: [character][0x1]...
Emperor Sauzer made an agreement with some monsters and was shown the mind of a Holy Dragon. Such an agreement would be far too frightening for me to make...[end]
Sauzer: ...That is correct.[end]
Sauzer: But... as I did not have the power to read the Holy Dragons' minds, it was a magnificent deal for me...[end]
Sauzer: Thanks to them I was able to read the mind of the Holy Dragon Hyperion...[end]
Were they Hyperion's dreams... Or his memories... I'm not certain...[end]
Sauzer: The feelings the Holy Dragons are hiding... They may perhaps be the truth...[end]

[character][0x1]: What does it mean? The fact that the Holy Dragons' minds are filled with anger... The fact that their anger is directed toward Bahamut...
Even I can tell that.[end]

[character][0x1]: But, they're hiding it. So that I won't know...
They're hiding the reason behind their anger and hatred...[end]
The Holy Dragon Hyperion... Inside his mind was a battle... a war.[end]
A war between the Holy Dragons...[end]
The Holy Dragons wounded each other... And shed each other's blood...[end]
Their minds taken by anger and hatred, they can no longer think...[end]
That battlefield was our world, Orelus...[end]

Campbell's greenery set ablaze, the lake of Mahal turned to poison...
Orelus' beautiful lagoons engulfed by the flames of destruction...[end]
Why must the Holy Dragons fight?[end]

Yes... Because Bahamut was there.
Bahamut, the guardian dragon of Kahna, is despised by the other Holy Dragons.[end]
Bahamut betrayed us... Bahamut disturbed the order... Kill Bahamut...[end]
These were... Hyperion's thoughts...[end]
However, I don't understand the Holy Dragons' fighting...[end]
Are they memories of ancient times... Or dreams of the future... I cannot tell...[end]
[character][0x1]: In our forgotten past there was a war between Holy Dragons. That, I know.[end]

Sauzer: I see...
Yet, the burning anger and hatred like that of long ago...[end]

So that's how it is...
The new era lying beyond the door...
It isn't for us... It's for the Holy Dragons...[end]
Rush: Okay...[end]
Sendak: The new era is for the Holy Dragons...? I... am confused...[end]
Rush: Then let's just not wake him up![end]

If those thoughts are still deep within the minds of the Holy Dragons... If things remain unchanged... The war in the past will continue into the future... They will defeat Bahamut... And the era of hatred will end... Is that... the new era...?[end]
Sendak: Everyone is thinking about what Emperor Sauzer said.[end]
Sendak: Bahamut, the guardian dragon of Kahna, is despised by all the other Holy Dragons... And the new era is to be after the Holy Dragons' war...?[end]

Matelite: If we wake up Bahamut, the Holy Dragons'll go to war again...
If that happens, Orelus'll be destroyed...[end]
Truce: Is that really a good idea? We started it all. We have to end it...[end]

Truce: And, there's something I don't understand. The Holy Dragons don't have bodies. They're just living inside [character][0x1]'s mind. Maybe it isn't the kind of war that could destroy the world?[end]
Sendak: Oh no! If Bahamut awakens, then the Holy Dragons' battle will begin inside the princess's mind! Her mind will contain all that anger and hatred... We must prevent that from happening...[end]
Rush: I felt like I was gonna die just from Hyperion's anger.[end]

Truce: All of the Holy Dragons' anger and hatred inside her mind...
How painful could that be...[end]
Taicho: It is terrible! [character][0x1] is in trouble![end]
Sendak: Princess...[end]

Sendak: I can hardly sense the minds of the Holy Dragons...
The princess surely is strong of mind now...[end]
Sendak: It is said that Dragonites live in Altair. If they are here, then the Holy Dragons can be revived...[end]
Sendak: Someday Matelite will quarrel with General Palpaleos. I am certain of it.[end]
Sendak: They said [character][0x1] spoke with Bahamut.[end]

[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons are confused right now...
It was necessary to gather the strength of all the Holy Dragons to open the door. Gathering their strength... Apparently this was the first experience the Holy Dragons had working together.[end]
[character][0x1]: The strength of the Holy Dragons is very powerful. But, it seems they didn't know how to use it.[end]
They savored watching the people of Orelus trembling in fear of their strength.[end]
This was the start of the Holy Dragons' war long ago.[end]
Truce: General Palpaleos! You! What about the war you started!?[end]
Then the battle with Bahamut, who tried to stop them, began. Then it escalated into a great war... Actually, other than Bahamut, the others are all very young.[end]
Truce: They didn't know how to control their power... Because of that, a war started... Countless people were killed in it...[end]
Palpaleos: The reason for starting a war is always something trivial...[end]
Truce: Are you saying that was because of some trivial reason?![end]

Palpaleos: ......
It was to realize a dream...[end]
Truce: That's trivial! Very trivial![end]
Sendak: One more thing, [character][0x1]![end]
[character][0x1]: Palpaleos! Wait![end]
Palpaleos: ...That may be so. However... I am prepared to take responsibility for it.[end]
Truce: Responsibility? Just how will you do that? I don't understand...[end]
Truce: Enough of this! I'm a member of Orelus' army. So I'm gonna fight! I'm gonna risk my life and fight![end]
Truce: But, I won't think anymore... If I think, I can't fight. It's just like Rush said![end]
Sendak: How did the Holy Dragons' war end?[end]
[character][0x1]: Because the sky... The door... closed.[end]
The Holy Dragons couldn't return to Altair since the door was closed.[end]

So the Holy Dragons hostile toward Bahamut were left here...
Once again, the days of fighting have returned.
The sadness of not being able to return to their homeland, despair, anger... All directed toward Bahamut...[end]
For humans too, times have been trying ever since then...[end]
Bahamut was also sad. Sad for the people who were engulfed by the war. Because he felt responsible.[end]
Bahamut decided to risk his own life...[end]
Sendak: Bahamut felt responsible, decided to risk his own life... then what?[end]
[character][0x1]: I'm sorry, Sendak. I'll tell you later.[end]
Rush: I don't like this...[end]
Rush: [character][0x1]! What do we do?![end]
Rush: Truce's thinking too much, as usual! No matter what happens, we're gonna fight! Uh... well I guess I'll think a little bit too...[end]
Truce: Emperor Sauzer's become very weak...[end]
Truce: I heard what Sauzer said from Sendak...[end]
Truce: Might we be cursed with the impossible?[end]
Truce: I won't think... I won't think about anything...[end]
Truce: Oops, sorry. I was thinking out loud.[end]
Truce: If he thought about for even just a minute, he'd see it. [character][0x1] and Rush. Their social positions are completely different. He should think more before acting...[end]

Truce: Altair at last...
There're rumors going around that our fighting's gonna end soon.
Even though we have no idea what's gonna happen...[end]

Hornet: What will we do, [character][0x1]?
Wait! Let's go!![end1]
Hornet: We don't know what will happen tomorrow...[end]

Hornet: [character][0x1]. Are we all ready?
Wait! Let's go![end1]
Being the acting captain must be hard work.[end]
But where are we going?[end]
[character][0x1]: I'm going to go talk with Bahamut.[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! You're going to wake up Bahamut?[end]

Sendak: If you do that, the Holy Dragons inside your mind will..!!
If something terrible were to happen we would be unable to help you![end]

[character][0x1]: I'm fine. I may be a little unreliable, but I'm the Queen of Kahna.
Bahamut, guardian dragon of Kahna... I am sure he has concealed his power for the moment.[end]
[character][0x1]: Hornet, please take us to Kahna![end]
Hornet: I can't right now. I can't move the ship just yet. Have a look outside the window...[end]
Okay... leave it to me![end]

Hornet: Well, [character][0x1]?
Not ready! Take off![end1]
Taicho: General Palpaleos. Can you fight against the kingdom you were born and raised in?[end]
Palpaleos: If I don't think about it. If I don't think about anything...[end]
Hornet: [character][0x1]. Where should I fly to?[end]
Wait! To the Granbelos Empire![end1]
Granbelos, huh... It'll take a little while. Go and make sure we're ready.[end]
Hornet: We're about halfway there.[end]
Hornet: We'll arrive soon, but things have take a turn for the worse.[end]

Hornet: What will you do, [character][0x1]?
I'll get ready! Take off![end1]
Hornet: It's quiet... But there are probably lots of monsters, don't you think?[end]
Zora: [character][0x1]. Leave Palpaleos to the princess. Don't worry, they'll be coming with us too.[end]
Zora: I never once thought I'd be taking care of the Emperor...[end]
Zora: Let them be alone...[end]
Zora: I can't find the words to comfort him...[end]

Zora: The queen told me to tell you this.
[0x24]Not even the Holy Dragons understand the reason why the door was closed long ago. They don't know what those monsters are, either.[0x22]
I wouldn't know anything about either, myself.[end]
[character][0x1]: Palpaleos...[end]
[character][0x1]: I hear Sauzer is going tell us about his talk with the Holy Dragon.[end]
[character][0x1]: He's okay, I'm sure of it...[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... I wonder if Emperor Sauzer is going to get better...[end]
Sauzer: This sky... was to be mine... This entire world of Orelus...[end]
Sauzer: Palpaleos.[end]
Sauzer: But... I lost.[end]
Sauzer: To the legend... To this never-ending sky...[end]

Sauzer: Without realizing my dream...
The new era... No matter what kind it was, I too would have liked to see it...[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer...[end]

Sauzer: There were people who told me that I had nothing...
Heh...
They were right.[end]
Sauzer: I have a request. Not as your emperor... A request as Sauzer, the person...[end]
Sauzer: If I die, release me... Release me into the skies of Orelus.[end]
Sauzer: Embraced by the infinite skies, I shall float among the white clouds...[end]
Sauzer: I shall float every which way...[end]
Sauzer: And then a lone lagoon will take me in... A lagoon no one knows of. Floating silently... And then I shall give that lagoon a name...[end]
Sauzer: There... I will start over from the beginning.[end]
Palpaleos: Start what over from the beginning?[end]

Sauzer: Yes...
I will make the entire sky mine!![end]
Sauzer: The time... has come...[end]

Palpaleos: Stop it! This weakness...
Sauzer! This isn't like you![end]
Sauzer: ...This is the new me. Inside me... Are all the things I scorned. There's uncertainty... Regret... Fear... And a weak mind...[end]
Sauzer: Ironic, isn't it. I lack only the true strength needed to overcome those weaknesses...[end]
Palpaleos: Stop! Don't speak! I'll call somebody![end]
Stay calm... Palpaleos...[end]
Sauzer: As Emperor of the Granbelos Empire, that is my final order![end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer!![end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer! Say something! Give me an order![end]
Sauzer: ......Don't cry...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! Take her to her room![end]
[character][0x1]: I'm... fine...[end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons inside me, they're...[end]
[character][0x1]: Okay, Holy Dragons! Use my body...[end]
[character][0x1]: I... I'm not afraid anymore. There are people who will protect me... People I must protect... I'm not... afraid anymore.[end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons... They want you all to hear this...[end]
Take us... Take us to Altair...[end]
Altair, our homeland... Once there, we shall leave this girl... There we shall free this girl...[end]
Matelite: Altair?! Where's that?![end]
Sendak: Do you mean that hole in the sky?! The world on the other side of the door?[end]
Matelite: The hole in the sky!? So the monsters that came out of there and attacked Kahna came from Altair?! Were they your allies?![end]
Take us to Altair... Take us to Altair...[end]

[character][0x1]: Everyone...
Altair is on the other side of the hole in the sky. They don't know what those monsters were either. So the Holy Dragons are confused too. This is the first time I've sensed confusion from them.[end]
[character][0x1]: Everyone! Let's go to Altair![end]

[character][0x1]: At this rate, the hole in the sky won't close. Monsters can come through to Orelus at any time. We'll have to go to Altair and defeat them!
And...[end]
[character][0x1]: And... If possible, I want to take the Holy Dragons back to their homeland...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]... You've grown strong... I'm so happy![end]
[character][0x1]: This battle is to protect Orelus. That is what my powers are for... That's what I think...[end]

[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... I... guess I'm a little scared after all.
But, it's strange... The Holy Dragons' anger isn't as strong as before.
It must be because they're worried and confused just like we are...
It's not just anger, I also know it's because I have a weak mind...
Or, [character][0x1], maybe it's because I'm a little stronger now?
Probably because of them. I dunno.[end1]
[character][0x1]: Thank you, [character][0x1]. That makes me feel better.[end]
[character][0x1]: Yeah, [character][0x1]. It isn't something that simple.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1], thanks for all your hard work.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... What's the matter?[end]
Where's the doorway? About rules and regulations... It's tough being the acting captain.[end1]
Where is the door to the new era...? Hold on, [character][0x1]. I'll look into the minds of the Holy Dragons. The relationship between me and the Holy Dragons is different than before.[end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons are gathering their power... The door won't completely open otherwise... The door is open. The location is...[end]
[character][0x1]: ...The skies above Granbelos.[end]
Palpaleos: The Granbelos Empire...[end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x1]. General Gudolf is still in Granbelos. He'll attack us for certain if we take [character][0x1] there.[end]

Palpaleos: When the time comes, [character][0x1]... Don't hold back.
Crush Gudolf and the Granbelos Empire.[end]
Palpaleos: This is for the people living in the new era that will finally dawn upon the Granbelos Empire...[end]
Palpaleos: Peace will return to the people of the Empire, who know of nothing but war...[end]
[character][0x1]: Just like Matelite![end]
[character][0x1]: When I'm not fighting, I want to be with Palpaleos. He cheers me up. Just like you used to, [character][0x1]...[end]
Zora's Son: Oh, hey, [character][0x1]. The ship sure seems gloomy.[end]
Zora's Son: No entrance for a while! My mom said so![end]
Zora's Son: Oh, good work![end]
Palpaleos: Sorry for making you come listen.[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer... is looking at the sky. Please let him be alone a little longer.[end]
Palpaleos: ......[end]
Palpaleos: If you're worried about [character][0x1], she's fine.[end]

Palpaleos: [character][0x1]. When we conquered Kahna we took many things as the spoils of war... Most of the soldiers disposed of them, and this was all that was left.
I brought it from Granbelos Castle, but [character][0x1] said I should let you have it, [character][0x1]. It belonged to the king of Kahna... Take it.[end]
You got an Empress Kahna and a Royal Gown.[end]
Sauzer: [character][0x1], was it? Take care of Palpaleos...[end]
Sauzer: I want to look at the sky...[end]
[character][0x1]: General Palpaleos. Use the terrace upstairs...[end]
Sauzer: Sorry to trouble you...[end][end]
